data.name: sqlDataSource1.SelectCommand
data.value:
SELECT ConsignmentDetails.ConsignmentDetailsId, ContainerDetails.ContainerDetailsId, BOLDetails.BOLDetailsId, VoyageDetails.VoyageDetailsId, VoyageDetails.LineCode, VoyageDetails.VoyageAgentCode, VoyageDetails.VesselName, VoyageDetails.AgentVoyageNumber, VoyageDetails.PortCodeOfDischarge, VoyageDetails.ExpectedToArriveDate, VoyageDetails.NumberOfInstalment, BOLDetails.BillOfLadingNumber, BOLDetails.BoxPartneringLineCode, BOLDetails.BoxPartneringAgentCode, BOLDetails.PortCodeOfOrigin, BOLDetails.PortCodeOfLoading, BOLDetails.PortCodeOfDischarge AS BOLDetails_PortCodeOfDischarge, BOLDetails.PortCodeOfDestination, BOLDetails.DateOfLoading, BOLDetails.TradeCode, BOLDetails.TransShipmentMode, BOLDetails.BillOfLadingOwnerName, BOLDetails.BillOfLadingOwnerAddress, BOLDetails.CargoCode, BOLDetails.ConsolidatedCargoIndicator, BOLDetails.StorageRequestCode, BOLDetails.ContainerServiceType, BOLDetails.CountryOfOrigin, BOLDetails.ShipperName, BOLDetails.ShipperAddress, BOLDetails.ShipperCountryCode, BOLDetails.ConsigneeCode, BOLDetails.ConsigneeName, BOLDetails.ConsigneeAddress, BOLDetails.Notify1Code, BOLDetails.Notify1Name, BOLDetails.Notify1Address, BOLDetails.Notify2Code, BOLDetails.Notify2Name, BOLDetails.Notify2Address, BOLDetails.Notify3Code, BOLDetails.Notify3Name, BOLDetails.Notify3Address, BOLDetails.MarksAndNumbers, BOLDetails.CommodityCode, BOLDetails.CommodityDescription, BOLDetails.Packages, BOLDetails.PackageType, BOLDetails.PackageTypeCode, BOLDetails.ContainerNumber, BOLDetails.CheckDigit, BOLDetails.NoOfContainers, BOLDetails.NoOfTeus, BOLDetails.TotalTareWeight, BOLDetails.CargoWeight, BOLDetails.GrossWeight, BOLDetails.CargoVolume, BOLDetails.TotalQuantity, BOLDetails.FreightTonne, BOLDetails.NoOfPallets, BOLDetails.SlacIndicator, BOLDetails.ContractCarriageCondition, BOLDetails.Remarks, ContainerDetails.ContainerNo, ContainerDetails.CheckDigit AS ContainerDetails_CheckDigit, ContainerDetails.ISOCode, ContainerDetails.TareWeight, ContainerDetails.SealNumber, ConsignmentDetails.SerialNumber AS ConsignmentDetails_SerialNumber, ConsignmentDetails.MarksAndNumbers AS ConsignmentDetails_MarksAndNumbers, ConsignmentDetails.CargoDescription, ConsignmentDetails.UsedOrNew AS ConsignmentDetails_UsedOrNew, ConsignmentDetails.CommodityCode AS ConsignmentDetails_CommodityCode, ConsignmentDetails.ConsignmentPackages, ConsignmentDetails.PackageType AS ConsignmentDetails_PackageType, ConsignmentDetails.PackageTypeCode AS ConsignmentDetails_PackageTypeCode, ConsignmentDetails.NumberOfPallets, ConsignmentDetails.ConsignmentWeight, ConsignmentDetails.ConsignmentValume, ConsignmentDetails.DangerousGoodsIndicator, ConsignmentDetails.IMOClassNumber, ConsignmentDetails.UnNumberOfDangerousGoods, ConsignmentDetails.FlashPoint, ConsignmentDetails.UnitOfTemperatureForFlashPoint, ConsignmentDetails.StorageRequestedForDangerousGoods, ConsignmentDetails.RefrigerationRequired, ConsignmentDetails.MinimumTemperatureOfRefrigeration, ConsignmentDetails.MaximumTemperatureOfRefrigeration, ConsignmentDetails.UnitOfTemperatureForRegrigeration FROM VoyageDetails INNER JOIN BOLDetails INNER JOIN ContainerDetails ON BOLDetails.BOLDetailsId = ContainerDetails.BOLDetailsId ON VoyageDetails.VoyageDetailsId = BOLDetails.VoyageDetailsId LEFT OUTER JOIN ConsignmentDetails ON ContainerDetails.ContainerDetailsId = ConsignmentDetails.ContainerDetailsId
where VoyageDetails.VoyageDetailsId=@voyageDetailsId
